Articles.Content:
Was messing around with some tests and came up with this plane.

Please give feedback ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Download: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/dq9m6g7z4tu0hkz/Kerthan%20II.craft](https://www.dropbox.com/s/dq9m6g7z4tu0hkz/Kerthan%20II.craft)

Tip for high flyers: Take the top two engines off and equip it with two Atmospheric Engines, you lose a bit of takeoff speed but can fly 2x as high!
